article_title: Weather, Discounts Boost May Retail Sales
article_text:
Retailers said sales continued to improve in May as warmer weather and a surge of promotions helped to boost store traffic.

Strong reports from Costco Wholesale Corp. and Gap Inc., which both have a heavy weighting in the Thomson Reuters retail sales index, helped overall results top expectations for the third consecutive month, with teen apparel retailer Buckle Inc. the only retailer on the index to disappoint.

Thomson...

article_summary:
Retailers said sales continued to improve in May as warmer weather and a surge of promotions helped to boost store traffic.
Strong reports from Costco Wholesale Corp. and Gap Inc., which both have a heavy weighting in the Thomson Reuters retail sales index, helped overall results top expectations for the third consecutive month, with teen apparel retailer Buckle Inc. the only retailer on the index to disappoint.
